description: #DavidIcke has officially been banned on #YouTube & #Facebook which are the largest social media platforms in the world, you may not agree with everything he says but if it were all just #ConspiracyTheory nonsense why are tech giants working so hard to silence him? We are watching the #GlobalElite push for the #NewWorldOrder more rapidly and unwavering then ever before and we are now at a pinnacle in history where all the things people like @davidickeofficial have been warning us about for decades are now unfolding before our very eyes; everything going on right now needs to light the fire under our asses to get organized & unite to stand up against these tyrannical power structures before its too late.
